firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.siql¶

class firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.siql.Siql(api: FiremonAPI, app: App)¶

Bases: object

Represent actions on the SIQL endpoint. All functions take a query which is a string containing the siql.

Parameters:

  • api (obj) – FiremonAPI()

  • app (obj) – App()

scheduleobj(query: str) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶
secrule(query: str) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶
serviceobj(query: str) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶
url = None¶
urlmatcher(query: str) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶
userobj(query: str) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶
class firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.siql.SiqlData(config: dict, app: App)¶

Bases: BaseRecord

A Siql Record.

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
